<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Ricochet](/Feats.aspx?ID=4837) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 149 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Incredible Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=4813)

</column>

---

After your first shot singles out your opponent’s position, you direct another that ricochets around obstacles and strikes unerringly. Make a ranged weapon Strike against a creature you previously attacked this turn. You ignore the target’s concealed condition and all cover.
name: Incredible Ricochet
